de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.Tile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionGeometryOwner, CollisionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimationTile, AutoTile, StaticTile

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollisionListener, CollisionGeometryOwner
    A single Tile in a Tiled map

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canCollideWith(CollisionGeometryOwner other)
      Get if this object can collide with an other return FALSE: This Entity has no collisions - not even collision notices return TRUE : This Entity can either hard or soft collide - depending on canMoveCollide() [!] ATTENTION PLS: The results of this function should be commutative ( a.canCollideWith(b) == b.canCollideWith(a) ).
      com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getTexture()
      Gets the current texture - the return value can change every cycle, don't cache this
      float getTextureRotation()
      Get the current clockwise rotation (of the texture) in degree.
      float getTextureScaleX()
      Get the current X scale (of the texture).
      float getTextureScaleY()
      Get the current X scale (of the texture).

      void onPassiveCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner activeCollider, CollisionGeometry myGeo, CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
      Called when this Objects collides with an other, because the position of the other was changed
      void onPassiveMovementCollide(CollisionGeometryOwner activeCollider, CollisionGeometry myGeo, CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
      Called when this Objects collides with an other in an movement because the other object moved The objects end beside each other (not colliding / intersecting) because its an movement

        Update the Tile

      • canCollideWith

        public boolean canCollideWith(CollisionGeometryOwner other)
        Description copied from interface: CollisionGeometryOwner
        Get if this object can collide with an other return FALSE: This Entity has no collisions - not even collision notices return TRUE : This Entity can either hard or soft collide - depending on canMoveCollide() [!] ATTENTION PLS: The results of this function should be commutative ( a.canCollideWith(b) == b.canCollideWith(a) ). If they are not canCollide(a, b) is calculated as a.canCollideWith(b) OR b.canCollideWith(a)
        Specified by:
        canCollideWith in interface CollisionGeometryOwner
        Parameters:
        other - the other CollisionGeometryOwner
        Returns:
        true if they can collide

                              CollisionGeometry otherGeo)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from interface: CollisionListener
        Called when this Objects collides with an other, because the position of this one was changed
        Specified by:
        onActiveCollide in interface CollisionListener
        Parameters:
        passiveCollider - the other participant
        myGeo - the geometry on this site, which collided
        otherGeo - the geometry of the other side that collided
